events.title: Collapsing Passage
events.description: As you navigate the dimly lit tunnels, a sudden tremor causes a section of the ceiling to collapse ahead, blocking your path. Dust fills the air, making it hard to breathe. You can hear faint groans from the other side of the rubble—possibly infected drawn by the noise.
events.trigger: Moving through unstable underground tunnels during or after a storm

choices.option: Attempt to clear the rubble quickly
choices.outcome: You manage to clear a narrow path but make a lot of noise in the process.

consequences.relationships: Others may admire your determination but worry about the noise.

choices.outcome: You backtrack and find another path, but it takes longer and consumes more resources.

consequences.relationships: Others may appreciate your caution but grow impatient.

rewards: Possible discovery of hidden supplies if clearing rubble
Knowledge of safer routes if taking an alternate path
events.flavor_text: The ceiling groans ominously as chunks of concrete and rebar crash down, sealing the way forward. The dust settles like a shroud, and the distant echoes of shuffling feet remind you that time is not on your side.
